item.title: What to know about the Sugar Bowl 2025
item.description: The Sugar Bowl, postponed after a tragic New Year's Day terror attack in New Orleans, will now kick off today at 3 p.m. CST.

item.title: FBI to brief House Homeland Security Committee on New Orleans attack
item.description: The Assistant Director of the FBI's Counterterrorism will brief the committee members and staff in a call on Thursday morning, according to a committe...

item.title: Former NYPD detective on New Orleans security surrounding deadly truck attack
item.description: Former NYPD Detective Felipe Rodriguez joined CBS News with his thoughts on the deadly New Orleans truck attack and security measures taken by the cit...

item.title: Authorities search for motive in deadly New Orleans attack
item.description: One day after a man drove a truck into New Year's revelers on Bourbon Street, law enforcement is searching for possible accomplices.

item.title: Authorities search Houston location linked to New Orleans truck attacker
item.description: The FBI said it searched a location in Houston in connection to the New Orleans truck attack that killed 15 people.
